text.section:
The Board may place a licensee on inactive status, if the licensee submits to the Board:
An application for inactive status on the form required by the Board; and
The inactive status fee set by the Board.

The Board shall issue a license to an individual who is on inactive status if the individual:
Submits to the Board:
Satisfactory evidence of compliance with the continuing education requirements the Board adopts for this purpose; and
A reinstatement fee set by the Board; and
Is otherwise entitled to be licensed.
